channel.title: YouTube Board
channel.description:
I thought well since we have a GFX related board why not have a Video related board. Since we can only post humorous things into that one YouTube topic in General Discussion I think it would be much easier to have a board specifically for YouTube or videos overall.
It would be much easier scrolling through titles instead of pages and pages of comments looking for that one video you saw earlier. It will also give people the chance to share their finished projects or even gather a team to work on a project.

item.title: YouTube Board
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Pretty obvious this idea isn’t currently liked by the staff. You can always try posting it again in the future. Marking as resolved.

Read full topic

item.title: YouTube Board
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

No from me also, its not even a good “general” idea like gfx was.

Read full topic

item.title: YouTube Board
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I don’t think so. This site is directed towards RSPS, having anything that specifically off-topic just seems strange. Posting youtube videos has its place in general discussion (depending on the content), and making them could go in graphics I think.

Read full topic

item.title: YouTube Board
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Well yeah that is what I meant by gathering a team. Maybe I should have explain it a bit further but it up to you guys.

Read full topic

item.title: YouTube Board
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I just don’t think we need something that specific. Graphics isn’t about showcasing, it’s about making them, too. A youtube board would essentially exist only to show off videos. If it were about making videos, that would be different. I just can’t say yes to this idea. I think it’s unnecessary since the general discussion board allows this so readily.

Read full topic
